FRAMES    NO FRAMES
SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

(default)
Enum cef_urlrequest_flags_t

   in cef_types.h

Flags used to customize the behavior of CefURLRequest.

Field Summary
UR_FLAG_ALLOW_CACHED_CREDENTIALS = 1 < < 1
          If set user name, password, and cookies may be sent with the request.
UR_FLAG_ALLOW_COOKIES = 1 < < 2
          If set cookies may be sent with the request and saved from the response.
UR_FLAG_NO_DOWNLOAD_DATA = 1 < < 6
          If set the CefURLRequestClient::OnDownloadData method will not be called.
UR_FLAG_NO_RETRY_ON_5XX = 1 < < 7
          If set 5XX redirect errors will be propagated to the observer instead of automatically re-tried.
UR_FLAG_NONE = 0
          Default behavior.
UR_FLAG_REPORT_LOAD_TIMING = 1 < < 4
          If set load timing info will be collected for the request.
UR_FLAG_REPORT_RAW_HEADERS = 1 < < 5
          If set the headers sent and received for the request will be recorded.
UR_FLAG_REPORT_UPLOAD_PROGRESS = 1 < < 3
          If set upload progress events will be generated when a request has a body.
UR_FLAG_SKIP_CACHE = 1 < < 0
          If set the cache will be skipped when handling the request.
 

Field Detail

UR_FLAG_ALLOW_CACHED_CREDENTIALS

public UR_FLAG_ALLOW_CACHED_CREDENTIALS = 1 < < 1
If set user name, password, and cookies may be sent with the request.

UR_FLAG_ALLOW_COOKIES

public UR_FLAG_ALLOW_COOKIES = 1 < < 2
If set cookies may be sent with the request and saved from the response. UR_FLAG_ALLOW_CACHED_CREDENTIALS must also be set.

UR_FLAG_NO_DOWNLOAD_DATA

public UR_FLAG_NO_DOWNLOAD_DATA = 1 < < 6
If set the CefURLRequestClient::OnDownloadData method will not be called.

UR_FLAG_NO_RETRY_ON_5XX

public UR_FLAG_NO_RETRY_ON_5XX = 1 < < 7
If set 5XX redirect errors will be propagated to the observer instead of automatically re-tried. This currently only applies for requests originated in the browser process.

UR_FLAG_NONE

public UR_FLAG_NONE = 0
Default behavior.

UR_FLAG_REPORT_LOAD_TIMING

public UR_FLAG_REPORT_LOAD_TIMING = 1 < < 4
If set load timing info will be collected for the request.

UR_FLAG_REPORT_RAW_HEADERS

public UR_FLAG_REPORT_RAW_HEADERS = 1 < < 5
If set the headers sent and received for the request will be recorded.

UR_FLAG_REPORT_UPLOAD_PROGRESS

public UR_FLAG_REPORT_UPLOAD_PROGRESS = 1 < < 3
If set upload progress events will be generated when a request has a body.

UR_FLAG_SKIP_CACHE

public UR_FLAG_SKIP_CACHE = 1 < < 0
If set the cache will be skipped when handling the request.
